title.rendered: Babymetal suben al escenario a Rob Halford para tocar ‘Painkiller’ y ‘Breaking The Law’

content.rendered:
La actuación tuvo lugar en la gala de los Alternative Press Music Awards

Rob Halford, vocalista de Judas Priest, actuó ayer junto a Babymetal en la gala de los Alternative Press Music Awards celebrada en Columbus (Ohio). Nuestras queridas niponas, junto a su banda de directo y el veterano vocalista interpretaron dos clásicos de Judas Priest: Painkiller y Breaking The Law. Halford no es el primer metalero de la vieja guardia en reconocer el trabajo de Babymetal, pues anteriormente otros artistas como Rob Zombie, Slash o Carcass han mostrado su apoyo.

En cuanto a los propios premios, y por si si estáis interesados, aquí os dejamos la lista de los ganadores y los nominados. Spoiler: vaya decepción de lista.

 

Vans “Off The Wall” Award:
Yellowcard

Classic Album Award:
Good Charlotte – “The Young And The Hopeless”

Icon Award:
Marilyn Manson

Fan-voted:

Best Vocalist:

Winner:
Patrick Stump (Fall Out Boy)

Nominees:
Alex Gaskarth (All Time Low)
Caleb Shomo (Beartooth)
Lzzy Hale (Halestorm)
Kellin Quinn (Sleeping With Sirens)
Corey Taylor (Slipknot)

Best International Band:

Winner:
You Me At Six (United Kingdom)

Nominees:
As It Is (United Kingdom)
Babymetal (Japan)
Marianas Trench (Canada)
One OK Rock (Japan)
Parkway Drive (Australia)

Best Bassist:

Winner:
Skyler Acord (Issues)

Nominees:
Ralph Sica (Being As An Ocean)
Ryan Neff (Miss May I)
Matthew Taylor (Motion City Soundtrack)
Ahren Stringer (The Amity Affliction)
Kelen Capener (The Story So Far)

Artist Philanthropic Presented By Hopeless Records And Sub City:

Winner:
Jake Luhrs – HeartSupport

Nominees:
Andrew McMahon – Dear Jack Foundation
The Used – Living the Dream
The Wonder Years – Puppies Behind Bars, After School All-Stars, The Herren Project, Futures Without Violence
This Wild Life – National Breast Cancer Foundation
You Me at Six – Passport Back to the Bars, The Ghost Inside U.K. Fundraiser, PETA

Best Live Band:

Winner:
Neck Deep

Nominees:
Attila
Beartooth
Issues
Motionless In White
Slipknot

Best Drummer:

Winner:
Christian Coma (Black Veil Brides)

Nominees:
Loniel Robinson (letlive.)
Jerod Boyd (Miss May I)
Dani Washington (Neck Deep)
Maxx Danziger (Set It Off)
Aaron Gillespie (Underoath)

Best Music Video Presented By Journeys:

Winner:
Panic! At The Disco – ‘‘Emperor’s New Clothes’’

Nominees:
All Time Low – “Something’s Gotta Give’’
August Burns Red – “Identity’’
State Champs – ‘‘If I’m Lucky’’
The Wonder Years – “Cardinals’’
Twenty One Pilots – ‘‘Stressed Out’’

Song Of The Year Presented By Epitaph Records:

Winner:
Panic! At The Disco – “Hallelujah”

Nominees:
Falling In Reverse – “Just Like You”
Never Shout Never – “Hey! We Ok”
Of Mice & Men – “Would You Still Be There”
Pierce The Veil – “The Divine Zero”
State Champs – “Secrets”

Best Underground Band:

Winner:
Too Close To Touch

Nominees:
Cane Hill
Creeper
Moose Blood
ROAM
Tiny Moving Parts

Most Dedicated Fanbase Presented By Fearless Records:

Winner:
The Ghost Inside

Nominees:
Issues
Mayday Parade
New Year’s Day
PVRIS
The Maine

Best Guitarist:

Winner:
Jack Fowler (Sleeping With Sirens)

Nominees:
Kevin Skaff (A Day To Remember)
JB Brubaker (August Burns Red)
Kellen McGregor (Memphis May Fire)
Chad Gilbert (New Found Glory)
Misha Mansoor (Periphery)

Breakthrough Band:

Winner:
State Champs

Nominees:
I Prevail
Knuckle Puck
Neck Deep
New Years Day
Set It Off

Artist Of The Year Presented By Monster Energy:

Winner:
Twenty One Pilots

Nominees:
All Time Low
Beartooth
Motionless In White
Real Friends
Fall Out Boy
Slipknot
Sleeping With Sirens
Panic! At The Disco

Album Of The Year Presented By Journeys:

Winner:
Twenty One Pilots – “Blurryface”

Nominees:
All Time Low – “Future Hearts”
August Burns Red – “Found In Far Away Places”
Bring Me The Horizon – “That’s The Spirit”
Knuckle Puck – “Copacetic”
The Maine – “American Candy”
Marilyn Manson – “The Pale Emperor”
Neck Deep – “Life’s Not Out To Get You”
Sleeping with Sirens – “Madness”
State Champs – “Around The World And Back“
